div1.p: Coppy Elisha Lewis Receipt for Property Recd. of Messrs. Moses Austin and Co at St Geneveve 26th May 1811 to be Reshipped at New Orleans to I T and C°
Shipped on board of Barge lying at St Geneveve the following Articles per a/c and Risque of Moses Austin and Co and Consigned to Isaac Tomlinson and C° New York

900lb of feathers 17.350lb Lead french Wt. one Pack 20 Bear Skins Eight Beaver two Muskrat two Otter twenty seven Racoon Three Bundles Bear Say forty one Skins one Dble and 2 Single Casks furrs one hundred and four venson hams fifteen Packs furs Muskrat. Racoon, otter. Bear. Wolf and Beaver Skins

one Cash Same. Recd the above Cargo of Moses Austin and C° which are to be reshipped at the port of Orleans To Isaac Tomlinson and C° New York. With Liberty to Sell So much as may be necessary for Shipping Charges and Necessary expences
